title: Will the deaths in the US be twice as many as those in the Vietnam War by autumn 2020?
subtitle: According to one estimate, the COVID-19 epidemic could lead to the death of up to 300,000 Americans by the end of 2020.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: The total number of COVID-19 deaths in the United States will be twice the number of American deaths from the Vietnam War by 2020.
